validation.min_length: This field should be at least {length} characters
validation.between: The value must be between {min} and {max}
validation.alpha: The value must be alphabetical with no spaces
validation.username: Only English characters, numbers and symbols are available for this field
validation.integer: The value must be an integer
validation.email: The value is not a valid email address
validation.ip_address: The value is not a valid IP address
validation.mac_address: The value is not a valid MAC Address
validation.same_as: The value must be equal to the {other} value
validation.url: The value is not a valid URL address
validation.or: The value does not match any of the provided validators
validation.and: The value does not match all of the provided validators
validation.not: The value does not match the provided validator
validation.phone: The value is not a valid phone number
validation.e164phone: The value is not a valid E.164 formatted phone number
validation.domain: The value is not a valid domain name (eg. mydomain.com)
validation.match: The value does not match required pattern
